column3: This is a generally correct statement, that could go into the RPC help instead?
f476fbdf84c88b7ab90aa3e9240b39806525a8b6\n\nnot sure if this was asked before, `CONNECTION_TYPE_DOC` is used only in src/rpc/net.cpp, why not just have it there?

hmm, good point! \n\nhistory: Marco suggested extracting in https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/19725#discussion_r470944955. I thought a benefit was to keep `CONNECTION_TYPE_DOC` next to `ConnectionType` definition for future updates, but now we don't have that regardless. I've moved into `src/rpc/net.cpp` and added a comment on the `ConnectionType` enum for future code changes.
